cardSubtitle: In 2014 I joined CoderDojo LX, there I learned scratch and the basics of js and C#
From 10º to 12º grade I took the professional course computer systems management and programming technician in the high school gil vicente
From 2020 to 2021 I worked in DLL Soluções Informáticas where I worked on multiple projects developing web pages using ASP.NET and JS
Currently I'm a studant in ISTEC taking the mobile device app development course
